feed.title: One on One
feed.subtitle: One on One, hosted by Jack Acello and Noah Schwartz, is an all-encompassing basketball podcast, specifically focused on the NBA. Jack and Noah, long-time college roommates, spend much of their free time watching, analyzing, and debating the NBA, and now they get to bring those conversations to the airwaves! Be sure to tune in weekly for some of the best basketball content available!

author.name: High Tops Media & Jack Acello, Noah Schwartz

entry.title: NBA All-Star Picks, Midseason Awards, and What’s Wrong With the Grizzlies and Warriors?! - Season 3 Episode 15

link.title: NBA All-Star Picks, Midseason Awards, and What’s Wrong With the Grizzlies and Warriors?! - Season 3 Episode 15

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah are back and they give their All-Star predictions as the game nears. They also go over their midseason awards, as well as discuss a few teams’ struggles and some new contract extensions.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/
https://twitter.com/1on1podHTM/
https://www.tiktok.com/@1on1bballpod/

And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

entry.title: Happy 2024! Knicks-Raps Trade, Darvin Ham on the Hot Seat, Nets Are a Mess, Trade Deadline Predictions - Season 3 Episode 14

link.title: Happy 2024! Knicks-Raps Trade, Darvin Ham on the Hot Seat, Nets Are a Mess, Trade Deadline Predictions - Season 3 Episode 14

entry.content:
One on One is back for 2024 with a jam packed show. Joined by Lucas Jafet of Share The Rock, the guys talk the Knicks-Raptors trade and how OG Anunoby has given New York the type of player they desperately needed. Then, they break down the Lakers recent struggles and Darvin Ham’s uncertain future as head coach. Next, discussions on the issues with the Nets, the immense success of the Clippers, and the Pistons finally ending their historic losing streak. The guys close the pod with some trade deadline predictions, including what the Thunder and Warriors might do, and a debate on where Dejounte Murray will play the rest of the season.

Be sure to tune in to all One on One content and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/
https://twitter.com/1on1podHTM/
https://www.tiktok.com/@1on1bballpod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

entry.title: Draymond Strikes AGAIN and Is Suspended AGAIN, Warriors Have Major Issues, Pacers and Bucks Have Beef, and the Injury Bug Strikes Cavs - Season 3 Episode 13

link.title: Draymond Strikes AGAIN and Is Suspended AGAIN, Warriors Have Major Issues, Pacers and Bucks Have Beef, and the Injury Bug Strikes Cavs - Season 3 Episode 13

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah discuss a wild week of NBA action. They talk a lot about Draymond Green’s latest outburst, when he punched Jusuf Nurkic in the face, and the indefinite suspension he is now serving. They also discuss the myriad of problems facing the Warriors currently, with a struggling, old roster around Stephen Curry. The guys also break down the hilarious incident between the Bucks and Pacers last week, and finish the show examining the Cleveland Cavaliers. The Cavs are now down two of their stars due to injury and face important questions regarding the future of Donovan Mitchell.

With the new season underway, be sure to tune in to all One on One content, and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/

entry.title: In-Season Tournament Thoughts and Reviews, Zion Williamson Struggles, Current State of the New York Knicks, and Quarter Season MVP Debate - Season 3 Episode 12

link.title: In-Season Tournament Thoughts and Reviews, Zion Williamson Struggles, Current State of the New York Knicks, and Quarter Season MVP Debate - Season 3 Episode 12

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah discuss the finish to the NBA In-Season Tournament and their thoughts on it all now that it’s over. They also discuss the recent play of Zion Williamson as well as where the New York Knicks currently stand. Lastly the guys debate who is the MVP of the league through the first quarter of the season.

With the new season underway, be sure to tune in to all One on One content, and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: Draymond Suspended, What Do the Clippers Do Next, Sixers Strong Start, and Zach LaVine Best Trade Destination - Season 3 Episode 10

link.title: Draymond Suspended, What Do the Clippers Do Next, Sixers Strong Start, and Zach LaVine Best Trade Destination - Season 3 Episode 10

entry.content:
This week, Jack and Noah discuss Draymond Green’s 5 game suspension as well as the recent James Harden trade and how it’s worked out for both sides so far. They also do their weekly debate on Zach LaVine and where he should go if ends up being dealt at this year’s trading deadline.

With the new season underway, be sure to tune in to all One on One content, and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: In-Season Tournament Early Thoughts, Surprises Through 2 Weeks, New-Look Clippers, and First Quarter Woes for the Lakers and Jack and Noah’s Beloved Jets - Season 3 Episode 9

link.title: In-Season Tournament Early Thoughts, Surprises Through 2 Weeks, New-Look Clippers, and First Quarter Woes for the Lakers and Jack and Noah’s Beloved Jets - Season 3 Episode 9

entry.content:
The guys are back this week to discuss the in-season tournament and how it’s gone so far. Do they like the courts, the format, and the competitiveness? Noah and Jack also talk about some surprises early in the season, including the Rockets and Chet Holmgren’s success in his rookie year. They talk about the new-look Clippers and how Harden has fit in so far. The guys close the show debating two of the worst first-quarter teams they’ve ever seen with the Lakers and their favorite NFL team, the Jets.

With the new season underway, be sure to tune in to all One on One content, and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts!

entry.title: NBA Season Early Takeaways and Who He Play For - Season 3 Episode 7

link.title: NBA Season Early Takeaways and Who He Play For - Season 3 Episode 7

entry.content:
This week, Noah and Jack are back and they discuss some of the early takeaways from the early games in the NBA season. Plus Noah looks to show he knows more players than Charles Barkley as he takes on the challenge of Who He Play For. Lastly the guys debate what the 76ers should do about James Harden.

With the new season underway, be sure to tune in to all One on One content, and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. entry.title: The NBA Season Is Here! Season Predictions, Giannis Commits to Milwaukee, Rookie Extensions, Steven Adams Injury, and Most Likely First-Time All Star - Season 3 Episode 6

link.title: The NBA Season Is Here! Season Predictions, Giannis Commits to Milwaukee, Rookie Extensions, Steven Adams Injury, and Most Likely First-Time All Star - Season 3 Episode 6

entry.content:
The regular season has arrived!!! In the final pod before games return, Noah and Jack start the show discussing the breaking news that Giannis Antetokounmpo has extended his contract on a new max deal with the Bucks. They also break down some of the other recent extensions handed out and talk about who else should have gotten paid but didn’t, as well as an unfortunate injury update regarding Steven Adams. Then, the guys make their standings and award predictions for the season and break down each one of their picks for this year. And finally, Jack and Noah do their first ever podcast debate in a new weekly segment, as they choose the most likely first time all-star this year.

With the new season underway, be sure to tune in to all One on One content, and take a look at the show’s social media channels for more activity than ever before. Follow the pod on Twitter (@1on1podHTM), IG (@1on1pod), and on the brand new TikTok (@1on1bballpod) where there will be an increased presence on all of these accounts. Can’t wait for the new season!

https://www.instagram.com/1on1pod/
https://twitter.com/1on1podHTM/
https://www.tiktok.com/@1on1bballpod/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media
